creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two similar panels flanking central patterned panel; central pattern of radiating diamonds in red, brown and cream; two panels are predominately brown with patterned and solid stripes in salmon, white, yellow and turquoise; white and red pompon tufts; red edging on short sides
title: Shirt
